thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com
thread.title: Joyce Smeton
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Joyce Smeton

author: Joyce Smeton
title: Joyce Smeton
text: Due to the remote place that I live in, CHW had difficulty finding someone that worked with them to repair my problem. They allowed me to get my own plumber. I paid the plumber and CHW reimbursed me for their portion of the service call. It did take longer than I expected to be reimbursed, but I was satisfied that they allowed me to get someone in my area without having a long wait for them to find someone.
